name: @everymundo/http-client
description: This is a helper to perform POST requests using promises and no external dependencies

scripts.cover: env RETRY_TIMEOUT_MS= MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS= SIMULATE= LOG_LEVEL=silent c8 -x test --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha test --recursive
scripts.check-lint: standard --env=mocha *.js lib/*.js lib/**/*.js classes/*.js test/**.js test/**/*.js
scripts.test: env RETRY_TIMEOUT_MS= MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS= SIMULATE= LOG_LEVEL=silent mocha test --recursive

ghooks.pre-push: npm run cover && npm run check-coverage

author: Daniel Santana <git@danielsantana.net>
